p: MIC 50 and MIC 90 [ 31] were calculated by ranking MICs for all 57 clinical and reference strains in ascending order. The MIC 50 was taken as the median value. The MIC 90 was the value of the 51 st (0.9 x 57) in the list, and represented the concentration of antibiotic that would inhibit 90% of the isolates tested.
